void '''ChangeActorPitch''' (int ''tid'', fixed ''pitch'' [, bool ''interpolate''])
==Usage== Sets the pitch for the actors with the specified {{c|[[TID|tid]]}}. If {{c|tid}} is 0, it sets the pitch for the activator of the script.
This function duplicates and extends on {{c|[[SetActorPitch]]}} by having the added option to interpolate the view.
===Parameters=== * ''tid'': the {{c|tid}} of the actor. * ''pitch'': the pitch to set. This is a [[definitions|fixed point angle]]. See {{c|[[GetActorPitch]]}} for the possible range. * ''interpolate'': whether to interpolate the view or not. If {{c|true}}, the view is interpolated, otherwise it is not. Default is {{c|false}}, i.e. no interpolation.
